Name: The Natural Choice
Review Content: The hotel is very beautiful, located in the center of the city which is a plus for those like me that like walking tours.About the food, specially the breakfast is very good, many variety and all made with quality.Downside is the absurd slow internet speed and that you can smoke just outside the hotel.
Date: Date of stay: February 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Getting shabby
Review Content: I have been a regular visitor over the years.  Initially, my impressions were very good but of late I have become surprised that the hotel is becoming increasingly shabby and service is slipping as well.  If this gets much worse, I will have to stop using the hotel although it is very convenient.
Date: Date of stay: February 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Very good hotel, centrally located
Review Content: The hotel is right in the center of the city. The room we had on the executive floor was relatively big and nice. The bathroom was open and all amenities were provided. The staff is very friendly and professional.The pool is small but nice and the pool bar on the roof top is very nice. The breakfast is amazing. The executive lounge is also nice.
Date: Date of stay: January 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Hilton Windhoek is amazing
Review Content: Great location, great staff (Eunice at reception & Vivian at the Executive Lounge were an absolute delight), & great food (we ordered room service several times and it was delicious, as was the variety at breakfast including a server to make you juice) & delightful rooms - many thanks from Australia
Date: Date of stay: January 2017This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Lacking five-star touch
Review Content: Highlights include the food in the Ekipa restaurant. Breakfasts are excellent with a great choice and the variously themed buffet dinners in the evening (local, Italian, Indian etc) are also very good. The Sky Bar and pool (although small) were great places to chill. Found the room to be noisy with people slamming doors at 3am and television dialogue travelling through the wall from the next room. Service is generally good with a few let-downs - some staff still haven't got the message that you don't scowl at guests even if they have a difficult request. It's a pity that with five-star prices free parking and wifi are not included
Date: Date of stay: December 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: The best Windhoek has to offer,  however too busy
Review Content: I spent 5 days in this hotel, the location is perfect,  close to many amenities,  the buffet restaurants were very good,  and skybar was excellent,  however the Sushi bar,  used very bad rice,  would not recommend it. The hotel is extremely busy,  which can be annoying,  and diminishes services. I felt services was appalling, I asked for an adaptor since I had a foreign laptop,  there was a pregnant lady at the front desk,  who just dismissed me,  by saying they did not have any left,  did not even bother looking for one,  I tried upgrading my room to have access to the business lounge like all the other Hiltons,  and I was told not possible. Would I recommend the hotel absolutely ,  however management needs to invest in more adaptors for foreign laptops and phones,  invest in training the front desk ladies to be more people friendly,  and train your red coat were securities to stop harassing guests every morning asking them whether they paid at checkout.
Date: Date of stay: October 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Excellent in every way
Review Content: The reasonable price of this hotel does not reflect the high quality of the establishment. Located in central Windhoek the rooms (which are excellent) are nonetheless quiet (we stayed at a weekend but noticed there were substantial building works at the back of the hotel which might be a problem). Service is more than excellent and the food the best we had during our Namibia trip.
Date: Date of stay: November 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Stay @Hilton Windhoek
Review Content: It was nice staying @ Hilton, staffs were very friendly and I got very nice city view room. Rooms were neat and tidy. All the services were excellent. I would recommend it to all my friends and family.
Date: Date of stay: November 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Excellent Meals away from Home
Review Content: This hotel is modern, the room architecture and fitting is good, not my style that is contemporary. This notwithstanding, the waiter service, dining and meals are nothing short of outstanding. Choice and freshness of meals, wide range at breakfast and a touch of authentic local foods enhances the experience. I would stay at the Hilton just to enjoy the meals that are not just generous but fresh and healthy!
Date: Date of stay: November 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Excellent Hotel
Review Content: They hotel was incredible and the Staff was excellent. The room was excellent and very comfortable. The veiw from the Bar and restaurant was incredible and food was excellent. I hope to stay there again
Date: Date of stay: October 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Great Panoramic View of Windhoek
Review Content: Had plenty of time before catching a flight to the WDH airport so we had drinks at the hotel's SkyBar rooftop. Price of drinks were reasonable and started at US$1.80 (Amarula), Malawi Shandy at US$2.50. They also served sushi but didn't try them since we were headed somewhere else for lunch. Very good service and beautiful panoramic view. Also, we got to check the crafts market at the back of the hotel.
Date: Date of stay: October 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Service leaves a lot to be desired
Review Content: Room not ready for 2pm Check in.Bill settled on card despite request to pay cashNo taxi booked for airport despite requesting in personService in bar very slow.Rooms were nice size and clean.For the price charged, paying for Internet on top is not a good experience!
Date: Date of stay: September 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Wonderful Stay
Review Content: Originally did not plan to stay here as rates were incredibly high for the location of the hotel. After booking and receiving a much lower rate day of booking online, I was very pleasantly surprised at the comfortable yet vibrant surroundings of the hotel. Had a wonderful dinner and enjoyed the lounge on the top floor before getting a wonderful nights rest. The front desk and bell staff were extremely welcoming and friendly. If you can find a deal for the rates I would definitely recommend a stay here.
Date: Date of stay: September 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Worthwhile and luxurious
Review Content: This is a hotel that lives up to its name. I had read a couple of reviews prior to my stay but I did not have many negative experiences. The staff are very friendly, both at the front desk as well as the restaurants. The breakfasts are wonderful and if one has to leave early, a breakfast pack can be arranged. The room service however, is rather limited for vegetarians. I ordered a pizza and after 45 mins it came. Very disappointing as there were hardly any toppings and this was basically a cheese pizza. What I don't understand is that there is a fee for a 'tray service' and in addition one is required to tip.
Date: Date of stay: September 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Ok
Review Content: They were busy building a new hotel right next to our window - it was loud and a horrible view. The food was pretty average. Cleaning ladies took 20‚Ç¨ out my purse. Quite a few very simple and plain guests. High Internet costs (no free wifi) and high transport costs. Windhoek is horrible. Totally overpriced (food, water, wifi, transport etc). The breakfast buffet is not bad, but dinner is horrible there. Everyone could prepare a better dinner buffet. Pool is dirty and many funny people hanging around on the roof top (people from outside and some kind of "ladies"). The rooms were clean, the bed was comfy and it's probably still one of the only addresses you may stay in Windhoek.
Date: Date of stay: August 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: tres bon pour commencer et finir un voyage
Review Content: Id√©alement plac√© √† deux pas du centre cet h√¥tel moderne jouit d'une belle vue sur la ville.L' accueil est bon,les chambres confortables et modernes.La nourriture est plut√¥t bonne(deux restaurants dont un-le mieux- interdit aux mineurs ).Piscine au dernier √©tage avec bar,sale de fitness et spa.WIFI et parking payants.Bar au rdc.
Date: Date of stay: August 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Great Infrastructure, lacking somehow on services
Review Content: Great building, rooms, facilities and down townCould have better service as staff seem unaware of the little things that could make a difference in a business tripI recommend it, given that overall stay was very goodHas 1 restaurant, buffet or a la carte, 2 bars (Sky bar and regular) and coffee place at the lobby
Date: Date of stay: August 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Overnight stay
Review Content: This was our 1st night of 5 in Namibia. We arrived in the afternoon so it was too late to try to drive to the desert. This was a nice choice, we had a nice room with a outside patio and view. We also had use of the executive lounge where you have a lovely view of the sun setting. The staff was very friendly and the room was comfortable and spacious. There were plenty of outlets for charging all the necessary items. We didn't explore the town, we were off to drive over 4 hours to our next destination. I am a Hilton honors member and would definitely stay there again the next time I am in Windhoek.
Date: Date of stay: June 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Parking sting and communal aircon
Review Content: On check out I was hit for an unexpected $60 for parking overnight. There is nowhere else to park for miles around. It was not specified in the estimate before I booked. Felt stung by this uninvoiced little aftershock.  The aircon is not individually controllable. You get a communal aircon setting. We got too hot and had a bad night as a result. Maintenance guy was attentive but ineffectual.  Don't try and use the many complicated buttons on the in-room phones. They don't correspond to the hotel's actual services. Just dial 0 and ask for what you want.
Date: Date of stay: July 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Nice hotel
Review Content: Stayed for one night before our tour.  We arrived late and our booking from Kayak did not show up but the front desk staff were very helpful and agreed to honor the Kayak price for our stay.  The rooms are very nice and comfortable and the breakfast buffet, which is included, was very good.  The only negative I would have is that the room service food isn't so good.  I had a caesar salad that consisted of lettuce, bacon, anchovies, eggs, and a mayo/miracle whip dressing.  No parmesan and no caesar dressing.  It was pretty yucky.  BUT the prices for room service are very reasonable.  They don't gouge because you are in your room. The staff was very nice and I would stay again.  Oh and the wifi is spotty in the rooms.  Sort of frustrating.
Date: Date of stay: June 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Surprised they can actually rate this as a 5 star hotel
Review Content: Stayed for 3 nights several weeks apart. Check in is okay but slow. Rooms are average size and beds are old and creaky - linen and pillows not in 5 star league by a long shot. On two seperate occasions my minibar was dead empty on check in , both times the air conditioner wouldn't work and the WIFI in room will drive you mad. Breakfast and dinner are in the 4 star league and pretty good. I believe there's much better value elsewhere. Considering this hotel charges the same price as the Intercontinental at Tambo airport the difference is night and day. Finally the spa is under - resourced and trying to get in for a massage after 25 hours of flying from the US or Australia was impossible.
Date: Date of stay: May 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Dont expect much
Review Content: Let me start with the positive aspect in that the front desk staff are friendly and the breakfast buffet is good but that's where it ends.   The general pace of service is very slow, try waiting half an hour for a glass of sparkling wine and a cocktail at the roof bar to hunting down a waitress for coffee at breakfast.   If you are an HHonours guest you will probably not find about the benefits you are entitled to until you leave including the free internet service which is very intermittent.   Then we have the issue of staff fidelity. I had gone out for dinner and upon my return I discovered that someone had been through my bag which was in the closet. Thankfully there was nothing of value in the bag but the fact remains that someone had rummaged through my stuff.
Date: Date of stay: May 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Good value with excellent location
Review Content: The hotel is centrally located with easy access whilst being able to avoid traffic. The rooms are well equipped, food great and good value for money. Paying N$60 per day for paying in the hotel garage is ludicrous especially given that there is no real general parking close with easy access to the hotel.
Date: Date of stay: May 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Great hotel for pre/post safari
Review Content: Great central location in town, 30 mins taxi from the airport,  nice spacious rooms and good breakfast buffet - one thing I would add is that room I stayed in would be a great  for a couple, but if you are sharing with someone who isnt a partner, has the potential to be slightly awkward as bathroom and bedroom are open pan!
Date: Date of stay: August 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Typical Hilton style
Review Content: Our friend dropped us off with 4 bags - 2 full of camping gear we didn't need overnight and we were checking out early in the morning, so the porter stored those for us. Check in was good and they arranged for a taxi in the morning. The room was big and the usual style,  but the shower and bathroom being open to the bedroom with no door  was a bit weird - not our style at all. The half lounge chair - not sure what you would call it, was really uncomfortable and hard to sit in. 2 ordinary chairs would have been much better. There was only  1 small shampoo and conditioner but housekeeping were pretty quick at delivering some more after a phone call. Had a pleasant drink at the rooftop bar which was refreshingly breezy. Cant comment on food as we didn't eat there for dinner and left too early, and breakfast is not included in the room rate. Check out at 6.30 am  took quite a while as they couldn't find cash to return my cash  deposit left the night before on check in, and the process re free internet for HH members being charged and then credited was also a small delay although that didn't appear on my bill. Overall Ok - nothing special.
Date: Date of stay: March 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Perfect to start/end Namibia trip
Review Content: This is a classic Hilton - we stayed one night prior to our flight departure. We were lucky to be upgraded to a stunning room with bathtub! Good service overall but a bit slow. The Skybar and Sky Pool is a trendy feature and is a great place to watch the sunset of Windhoek. The gym facilities overlook Windhoek and are good.  They organized cabs for us which were good value. There is a wide choice for breakfast. Would stay there again and would recommend as a good place to stay at the start/end of your Namibia trip.
Date: Date of stay: February 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Hilton Windhoek
Review Content: My stay at the Hilton Windhoek was fantastic. I enjoyed the fact that I could move around the hotel and there were 5 different places I could have dinner. The staff were great! I would recommend this hotel to friends and family!
Date: Date of stay: February 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: overpriced for the quality of service
Review Content: Nice location but there is an on-going construction on all sides of the hotel.  The main problem was that the internet is really slow.  The hotel feels worn out and in need of a face-lift.  The services overall are pretty average and fall below expectations for the star-rating..
Date: Date of stay: February 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: What you expect from a Hilton
Review Content: Stayed at the Hilton for the last week of January 2016.  Service, room, amenities were all first rate.  The roof top bar is a great place to unwind after a day at work - friendly and professional service and a great view.  I have stayed at other hotels in Windhoek on two previous occasions and was very disappointed with them.  I will stay at the Windhoek Hilton on future visits.
Date: Date of stay: January 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Dubbio!
Review Content: Questo hotel √® stato un buon punto di partenza e di arrivo per il mio viaggio in Namibia.L'arredamento √® molto carino ed elegante. La prima volta:Eravamo 3 persone in una stanza, e ci hanno giustamente fornito di due letti. Nella stanza non c'era il terzo asciugamano e nel letto non c'erano le fodere. La seconda volta:Siamo entrati in una stanza che a parer nostro non era stata ripulita, ma solo sistemata. L'asciugamano non era assieme all'altro pulito, ma era gi√† attaccato all'appendino della doccia "Come se fosse stato usato e poi appoggiato l√¨".Forse ho avuto suggestioni date dalla stanchezza.. O forse siamo solo stati sfortunati, per√≤ riporto le mie impressioni e quelle dei miei compagni! Per il resto, il ristorante dell'hotel √® buono. In particolare c'era un ragazzo alla griglia molto gentile e disponibile.
Date: Date of stay: January 2016This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Great city hotel
Review Content: Great classy design hotel with superior rooms (original bath room) and great service. Nice roof top bar with a splendid view on the city. Very good located, especially when having to take a plane early in the morning. Breakfast box is very basic and could be better.
Date: Date of stay: November 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Prima hotel, zeer compleet en mooi!
Review Content: Wij sliepen hier Een nacht en waren blij verrast met de fraaie kamer. Heerlijk bed en prachtige stortdouche! Geweldig ontbijt.Hotel beschikt over fraaie fitness en zwembad en skybar op de bovenste verdieping.Enige minpunt op 2e etage was het doordringende geluid van muziek mogelijk van het casino ernaast.Wij zijn nog teruggeweest voor een drankje in de skybar.Geen verse huiver is wel wat matig voor zo'n tophotel!
Date: Date of stay: December 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Moderne, central, grand confort et superbe terrasse
Review Content: Le choix du Hilton s'est impos√© par sa position centrale. Les chambres sont tr√®s confortables et l'h√¥tel apporte tout ce que l'on attend :Le wifi fonctionne tr√®s bien dans les parties communes et au Sky BarLe petit d√©jeun√© conviendra √† toutes les bouches, tr√®s complet sous forme de buffet.Restaurants et bar tr√®s bons, nous avons test√© le Sushi bar : Tr√®s bon et belle cave √† vin.Parking payantBar et piscine sur le toit. Celui-ci, le Sky bar offre une superbe vue sur Windhoek et y sirot√© un verre de vin pour le couch√© de soleil reste un excellent souvenir.A deux pas des commerces et des principaux "monuments".Je recommande vivement.
Date: Date of stay: November 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Nice place with views in the center of town
Review Content: We stayed two nights before starting out on our drive around the country. Windhoek itself is pretty low key with not much to do in town, but the Hilton had good service, a nice rooftop pool and cool Skybar with great views at sunset. Location is central, easy walk to shopping and local sites.We were celebrating our anniversary and the Hilton gave us some nice treats for the occasion. The only complaint we had is that when we went to the spa to get our complimentary  massages, the staff person  scheduled to do my husband's, was so late arriving that I was nearly finished and we had to leave, so he went without.Other than that, it was a very good stay.We are going back for our last night before leaving Namibia.
Date: Date of stay: November 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Pleasantly surprised.
Review Content: Before our two stays at the Windhoek Hilton in November 2014 I was concerned by some negative reviews that I had read on  Tripadvisor. I have  no reason for concern now. The hotel is a modern, sleek hotel that is worthy of the Hilton name. This was our first stay in a real hotel in Africa, and we were made to feel right at home. The staff was great. The restaurants were great and the room was great. A light bulb had burned out in the room, and that was our major complaint - completely inconsequential. I would be happy to stay there in future visits to Namibia. Keep up the good work.
Date: Date of stay: November 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Interesting
Review Content: On average, my stay at the hotel was not bad at all. I like the peace and quiet around there and the entire place is really clean. Check it out, its awesome. Tell your friends to visit Namibia and try out the Hilton hotel in the capital city. The people are very lovely and always smiling.
Date: Date of stay: September 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Verdient die ***** nicht.
Review Content: Wir haben innerhalb von wenigen Wochen zweimal im Hilton Windhoek √ºbernachtet. Zuerst zwei und dann noch ein Nacht.Beim ersten mal hatten wir keine Badt√ºcher im Zimmer und es hat ziemlich lange gedauert bis wir welche bekamen. Damit unser schmutzige W√§sche abgeholt wurde haben wir am Morgen vor 7 Uhr angerufen. Am Mittag war der W√§schesack immer noch im Zimmer. Erst nach unserem dritten Anruf wurde dieser dann am Nachmittag abgeholt.An der Kommode waren zwei Schubladen nicht benutzbar.Bei unserem zweiten Besuch bekamen wir haben wir das Zimmer 400 bekommen obschon wir beim auschecken des ersten Aufenthaltes wieder das gleiche Zimmer 401 gebucht hatten.Zimmer 400 hatte einen extrem fleckigen Teppich das es einem grauste barfuss durch darauf zu laufen. Am Empfang hat man dies mit Bedauern zur Kenntnis genommen aber keine Alternative angeboten. Im Bad fehlten die kleinen Frotteet√ºcher. als wir diese zum zweiten mal beanstandet hatten bekamen wir dann noch einmal zwei gross.Am Abreisetag hat kurz nach 8  ein Angestellte (vermutlich vom House Keeping) an unsere Zimmert√ºre geklopft um zu Fragen um welche Zeit wir auschecken w√ºrden. Das haben wir noch nie erlebt. Das Personal am Empfang war sehr freundlich und der Portier hat uns erlaubt unser grosses Fahrzeug auf dem VIP-Parkplatz abzustellen, da es nicht in die Tiefgarage passte.Zur Zeit wird auf beiden Seiten des Hotels gebaut und in der Baugrube waren auch am Samstag schwere Baumaschienen am l√§rmen.
Date: Date of stay: September 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: mecontent
Review Content: hotel confort bien mais exp√©rience d√©sastreuse on vous donne une chambre un gars vient faire un relev√© bar avant  nous n avons rien bu aucune condamnation dans le frigobar  et le lendemain une facture de consommation elev√© scandaleux j ai cru que j allais sauter derri√®re le comptoir pour me d√©fendre tellement j √©tais enerv√© scandaleux honte a hilton  il a fallu apr√®s des discussions interminables avec notre responsable de groupe a priori reconnaitre notre bonne foi du moins je l essorer donc si vous allez la bas m√©fiez vous aussi du wifi gratuit seulement dans le hall dans votre chambre vous payer 6 mois apr√®s la moutarde me monte encore au nez................j ai d√©j√† pris des chambres au hilton ailleurs tr√®s bien mais la.....................a leur d√©charge c √©tait pour le 25 anniversaire de l ind√©pendance de la namibie un voyage fabuleux dans ce merveilleux pays mais pas a hilton
Date: Date of stay: March 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Welcome to Namibia
Review Content: We spent our first 2 nights in Namibia at Hilton Windhoek and everything was perfect - location, service, food, and warm rooftop pool (only really appreciated on discovering every other pool in Namibia to be very chilly!). Great hotel.
Date: Date of stay: August 2015This review is the subjective opinion of an individual contributor and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Excellent service
Review Content: Nice city hotel with excellent service and nice comfortable rooms. Nice sky and executive lounge on top of the city. The beef burger is to be recommended. A special thanks to the helpful and supporting employee Anna Asser who made my day.
Date: Date of stay: August 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Excelente Servicio y Economico
Review Content: La comida es muy buena y me parece un precio muy econ√≥mico con todos los servicios que tienes disponible es muy moderno y ademas los recepcionista muy amigables. Las habitaciones muy c√≥modas y la terraza excelente solo la piscina deber√≠a ser climatizada pero del resto excelente.
Date: Date of stay: August 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Wedding anniversary
Review Content: Our 20th weeding anniversary was a memorable experince. The staff at the Hilton went the extra mile to ensure that our stay was pleasurable and so that we could enjoy a romantic evening alone.......it was great. Thank you Hilton
Date: Date of stay: June 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Business hotel with comfort
Review Content: The Hilton is probably the only real business hotel in Windhoek. The service is professional but kind. People are very helpful. You can choose between 3 bars, there's a nice pool on the roof. Breakfast is excellent. The room are spacious. Sometimes the elevator is a challenge as the card don't work. We didn't mind, take it easy :-). If you have a care you can park in the basement.
Date: Date of stay: May 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Biz visit, three nights
Review Content: Excellent value. Breakfast is delicious, rooms clean and modern. Careful on wet bathroom floors as they can be very slippery.Dinner was great, filet mignon dinner a $71 USD!The pool and fitness center, as well as the roof top bar afford a beautifull view of the city.Be sure to exchange $$ at the airport as the front desk may not always have much NA $$s on hand
Date: Date of stay: January 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Accommodation
Review Content: Great service and food. Should be first choice for any traveller to Namibia. Thursday night is Indian night and the spread is awesome. The rooms are elegant with the best nights sleep I have ever had. When in doubt stay at the Hilton you will never go wrong.
Date: Date of stay: March 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Wonderful stay
Review Content: Large, spacious, clean, comfortable, and modern rooms. Great rooftop pool and bar with stunning views of the city and the Eros mountains in the distance - great for a sundowner.Truly excellent staff, who were more than accommodating for my currency exchange issues, last-minute transport requests, and they even helped pull together a really fun day of touring when I found myself with an unexpected day off during my stay.My Only complaint is the WiFi costs - at a luxury/business hotel, WiFi should be covered by the room rate.
Date: Date of stay: March 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Hilton Windhoek stands out
Review Content: The check in service is great, as well as the in room dining. Rooms are very clean, and tastefully decorated. And the size of the rooms are so spacious. And the location is very central to all our business needs. Definetely highly recommended.
Date: Date of stay: February 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Quite nice
Review Content: I arrived late on a Friday. The Concierge caption was exceptionally helpful in resolving a problem I had reaching an up country Namibian reserve.    He worked the phones incessantly.  My only complaints are weak wifi and a failure to replenish room's refrigerator!  Overall a nice experience.
Date: Date of stay: October 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Angenehm
Review Content: Ein optisch tolles Hotel, das auch im Service und in den Zusatzangeboten √ºberzeugt. Der Aufenthalt ist angenehm und stressfrei. Restaurantbereiche und Bar sind in der geschmacklichen Qualit√§t hervorragend. Manches Prozedere ist kompliziert, dient aber der Sicherheit, wie zum Beispiel die Benutzung der Keycard f√ºr den Aufzug.
Date: Date of stay: January 2015This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Een uitstekend en luxe stadshotel en zeer centraal gelegen
Review Content: Ideaal om je vakantie te beginnen of voor de zakenreiziger. Direct centraal in het centrum gelegen.Mooie ruime kamers met een grote luxe badkamer met apart toilet. Op Het dakterras met zwembad is het uitstekend toeven. De service is zoals je mag verwachten van een 5* hotel.
Date: Date of stay: November 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Hilton Namibia
Review Content: Staff is very polite, and will assist you , but a lot of things are not ok , lamps in the bathroom not working, refill of bathroom amenities very poor, used minibar ... room service poor, you order something and u will receive something else!
Date: Date of stay: December 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Great place to stay
Review Content: I really enjoyed my room, fresh, clean and well designed. The shower had a double head, brilliant. And the second best smelling shower gel of any hotel I have stayed at (Movenpick Geneva has the best... :-) ). It is always great to have an iron and board in the cupboard as standard. Less great is wi-fi is free in the restaurants and in the foyer, but not in the rooms.... this is backwards! Parking was free, which is also a great touch in terms of service. What was not great was my lunch, Chicken was dreadful... and thereafter I decided to eat out. Service was not so great, I had to go to the counter to order a coffee, and then sat for 2 hours without a single waiter asking if I wanted anything. Overall I can still very much recommend staying here for trips to Windhoek.
Date: Date of stay: November 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Service above and beyond
Review Content: We stayed at the Hilton in Windhoek, Namibia and were very pleased.  The room was nice and  the breakfast buffet was lovely.  But we had the unfortunate experience of having my ATM card stolen at the bank down the street.  When we tried to call the International number on the back of the card there was no answer.  We had the same result the next day.  The woman at the concierge desk (and I am embarrased to say I don't know her name) got on her computer and found us a number in Canada who then found us a working number in the States and we were able to shut down the card. She spent the time to help us and placed the call at the hotel's expense.  She really couldn't have been more helpful and that kind of service is PRICELESS!
Date: Date of stay: October 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Surprisingly good
Review Content: I had been disappointed to find that due to overbooking, our tour operator had been unable to book us into the usual boutique hotel and had booked us into the Hilton. I feraed an anonymous international chain hotel. But in the event I found it delightful. The service was excellent. The room was large and well-appointed. The rooftop pool , while not big, enables you to swim proper lengths. Breakfast was absolutely excellent with a wonderful range of hot items, eggs cooked to order, smoothies and vegetable juices made to order and lovely baked goods. Service in the skybar was a bit haphazard with several bar staff hanging about aimlessly while people were waiting to be served but that is the only criticism. Front door staff and front desk staff were very helpful. It was a real pleasure to stay there.
Date: Date of stay: October 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Pas de dispo ailleurs, h√¥tel choisi par d√©pit
Review Content: Je ne peux pas dire que l'h√¥tel est mauvais. Il est beau, moderne, confortable, la chambre est plut√¥t √©l√©gante, la literie est de tr√®s bonne qualit√©, le petit d√©jeuner est copieux. En revanche, le service est tr√®s moyen; il faut presque courir apr√®s les serveurs pour qu'ils viennent vous servir. Le sourire ne fait pas toujours partie du service l√† bas. On sent une r√©elle diff√©rence entre un petit h√¥tel tr√®s intime et attentionn√© et une grande chaine telle que le Hilton Windhoek qui n'en a presque rien √† faire du client. C'est tr√®s impersonnel. Niveau propret√©, c'est correct si on oublie le fait que la chambre n'est faite qu'une fois par jour et en milieu d'apr√®s midi. On se demande si le personnel est en nombre suffisant pour la structure.Le plus gros point noir est la foule de monde qui transite dans cette structure. A la piscine, difficile de se trouver une place. Cet espace dernier √©tage est envahi en fin de journ√©e. Avec la foule d'enfants qui hurlent dans l'eau, on se croirait √† la piscine municipale. Vraiment, cet h√¥tel manque d'intimit√©. En prime, je commande quelques cocktails en esp√©rant mieux √† chaque fois, ils √©taient tous plus immondes les uns que les autres. Ils devraient revoir leurs recettes de cocktails, je n'ai pas r√©ussi √† les boire.Nous aurions tant aim√© r√©server dans d'autres structures qui nous semblaient beaucoup plus attrayantes mais aucune n'avait de disponibilit√© sur les deux nuits (de week end) o√π nous avions pr√©vu de s√©journer sur Windhoek. Nous avions donc choisi le Hilton par d√©pit.
Date: Date of stay: October 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: sehr gut
Review Content: Zentral gelegendes Hotel mit Pr√§dikat sehr gut. Schade, dass isch alle wegen des sehr schlechten Internetservices beklagen mussten. Das darf in einem Hotel dieser Art nicht vorkommen, auch nicht wenn es sich um wenig tage handelt.
Date: Date of stay: September 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Goed hotel
Review Content: Bijzonder vriendelijk personeel. Alleen het feit dat voor internet betaald moet worden is in mijn optiek niet van deze tijd.Het hotel is centraal gelegen met winkels en supermarkten in de nabijheid. Ik zal zeer zeker gedurende mijn volgende trip naar Windhoek van dit hotel gebruik maken
Date: Date of stay: August 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Very Good
Review Content: Very good conditions, excelent room service, excelent room conditions. Everything is clean and fresh. I was there with my family and it's very good. It's expensive, but the price it's according to the excelence of service that Hilton's provide.
Date: Date of stay: August 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Sehr guter Ausgangspunkt einer Namibia-Reise
Review Content: Wir verbrachten 1 Nacht im Hilton-Windhoek zur Beginn unserer Namibia-Reise. Ein tolles Hotel f√ºr den Anfang oder das Ende einer Namibia-Rundreise. Es liegt sehr zentral an der Einkaufsm√∂glichkeiten und die wenigen Sehensw√ºrdigkeiten, die Windhoek zu bieten hat, sind zu Fuss zu erreichen.Sehr aufmerksames Personal. Sehr zu empfehlen ist auch die Dachterasse mit Pool und Sky-Bar (tolle Aussicht!).Minuspunkte: W-LAN sehr teuer und man konnte am Wochenende kein Geld tauschen. Dies war erst Montag morgens wieder m√∂glich, als auch die gegen√ºberliegende Bank ge√∂ffnet hatte.
Date: Date of stay: July 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Newly renovated
Review Content: Hilton's always provide a good service and a generally good experience, but occasionally let you down via tired rooms. This was not the case in Windhoek. I am not sure when the renovations were done, but I would say in the last 12 months. Rooms were well sized and comfortable. Not if you are sharing a bed with a friend, note the bathroom is mostly glass and open to the bedroom, private enough, but you want to make sure they are a good friend!The pool deck/sky bar is a great place to watch the sun set over Windhoek, and if there is a sport game of note on, then the Kalabar is the place to be. I didn't try any of the restaurants, but they were busy whenever I went past, which is a good sign.
Date: Date of stay: June 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Overlooking Windhoek
Review Content: The new and very modern Hilton is right at the edge of Downtown Windhoek and offers a nice view, specially from the north facing rooms, as well as from the 9th floor rooftop with swimming pool and the Sky Bar, currently the talk of town and the place to be for busy after work and weekend Bar nights. Up here you can also find a Gym, Beauty Center and the Executive Lounge. Rooms:The rooms are large and in a modern open plan concept with plenty of storage and a seating area. The bathroom is half open to the room and offers a bathtub, shower and a wide wash dish area. The toilette is behind a separate door for some privacy. On the 1st floor you‚Äôll find a nicely appointed Restaurant with a open kitchen for Buffet style breakfast and lunch / dinners. Right next to it, there is also a indoor Bar on this floor.Parking:The Hilton has it‚Äôs own Parking Garage, accessible past the main entrance to the lower parking deck, large enough to fit also bigger 4√ó4 SUV‚Äôs.
Date: Date of stay: February 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Disappointing
Review Content: A relatively new, well-located hotel with troublesome construction flaws: roof-top pool leaks into central hall; showers causing moisture damage in rooms.   And internet for N$185 per user/ per device / per day? Totally not on!
Date: Date of stay: May 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Top Range
Review Content: This is the best hotel in the land of the brave. No other. Top or the range. Cut above the rest. Its either Hilton, or nothing else. The room experience is 2nd to none. the bedding is out the world. quality furnishings. the carpeting is out this world. room and environment ventilation, cooling and heating are more than excellent. There is no other. Its only hilton. I am a life customer of hilton because of the value for money l get each time l check in. I am Hilton for life!
Date: Date of stay: April 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Disappointment with the service and quality
Review Content: Most of the time during my travels i stay in the Hilton Hotels, good service and good quality! I was surprised and shocked with the level of service and the lack of quality control (shower mixer not working and lifts out of order) with my stay at this hotel!
Date: Date of stay: March 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: A nice Hilton property, excellent value for money on food
Review Content: This was a good choice for three nights. The hotel is nicely decorated with tones of the country using stone and wood and well designed: the rooms are entirely separate from the reception and lobby area. Rooms are spacious and again much better decorated than most standard Hiltons with a nice (open to the room) bath area. The rooftop terrace is nice with a long but very thin pool so that exactly one person can do the laps. I felt the food in the restaurant for dinner was very good indeed and best value for fillet steak or wine. A nice feature in this ex-German colony are the cakes in the lobby. Service was very friendly and of a good standard. Hotel is in a central location so you can walk everywhere.
Date: Date of stay: February 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Hilton senza sorprese...
Review Content: ottima posizione, di livello la proposta della colazione, bene la pulizia delle camere buona la cucina, ottimo per sviluppare bussines, infatti √® un punto di riferimento per tutti gli incontri in citt√†.Unico Neo la wifi a pagamento con prezzi non a buon mercato.Una nota positiva per noi italiani, il caff√® espresso servito nella hall !
Date: Date of stay: January 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Immer wieder
Review Content: Ich war in Windhoek -Hilton.Das sch√∂nste Hotel in der Stadt.besonderes von der Pooletage hat man eine tolle Aussicht √ºber die Stadt.Ich habe mehrere 5 Sterne Hotels besichtigt,und keine war so toll wie Hilton.immer wieder.
Date: Date of stay: January 2014This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Oasis of tranquility
Review Content: Oasis of tranquility in Windhoek. Rooms are modern, big and with good views on the city. Breakfast is what you can expect from Hilton: abundant. Roofterrace issomething you would come back for. Swimmingpool with views of the complete city. Only point of attention is the staff: a bit arrogant and not very keen on thinking along.
Date: Date of stay: December 2013This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Name: Gewohnter Hiltonstandard
Review Content: Hatten uns f√ºr das Hilton entschieden, da es zentral liegt und man alle Sehensw√ºrdigkeiten zu Fuss erreichen kann. Wir waren nur f√ºr 1 Nacht hier, es ist sehr zu empfehlen vor oder nach einer Rundreise. Das Hotel liegt an der Kreuzung zur Independence Avenue. Leider hat die zentrale Lage dann den Haken, dass es nicht unbedingt ruhig ist. Hatten einen Garden-Executive Room gebucht,  der ‚ÄúGarten‚Äù bestand aus 2 Palmen und ein bisschen Gr√ºn auf dem Balkon mit Aussicht zum Busparkplatz und grosser Baustelle! Gl√ºcklicherweise war es die Nacht von Samstag auf Sonntag, so dass wenigstens niemand auf der Baustelle gearbeitet hat. Das Hotel war aufgrund einer Tagung ausgebucht, die Rezeption war zeitweise nur mit 1 Person besetzt und diese hatte sehr viel zu tun, in der Lobby herrschte insgesamt ziehmliche Hektik und grosse Unruhe.  Auch war die Tiefgarage belegt, so dass wir auf den ‚Äúdrop-off‚Äù Pl√§tzen parken durften (es wurde uns auch keine Geb√ºhr in Rechnung gestellt).Das Zimmer war sehr ger√§umig, mit 2 grossen Fenster und Balkon, offenem Badezimmer, sep WC und Dusche. Grosses Bett und gen√ºgend Ablagefl√§che, allerdings dicke Teppichb√∂den! Obwohl Nichtraucherzimmer hatte offensichtlich unser Vorg√§nger im Zimmer geraucht. Da keine freien Zimmer zur Verf√ºgung standen, baten wir um Aufstellung eines Raumerfrischers ‚Äì allerdings wurde dies erst nach der 3. Aufforderung erledigt (housekeeping sei sehr besch√§ftigt)Die Executive Lounge ist sehr sch√∂n eingerichtet, befindet sich gegen√ºber des Schwimmbades und der dazugeh√∂renden Bar auf der Dachterrasse. Von hier hat man einen tollen Blick auf die Stadt. Zeitungen, Internet, Softdrinks gratis. Abends gab es kleine Snacks, alkoholische Getr√§nke wurden  nur bis 20 Uhr ausgeschenkt.Fr√ºhst√ºcksbuffet liess keinerlei W√ºnsche offen, sehr vielf√§ltig, grosses Angebot an warmen Speisen, sehr freundliches Personal.
Date: Date of stay: October 2013This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
